verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%>
"No doubt, <S%H551><s%> but you are the people, <S%H5971><s%> and wisdom <S%H2451><s%> shall die with you. <S%H4191><s%>
But <S%H1571><s%> I have understanding <S%H3824><s%> as well as you; <S%H5307><s%> I am not inferior to you. <S%H3644><s%> Yes, who doesn't know such things as these?

I am like one who is a joke <S%H7814><s%> to his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> I, <S%H7121><s%> who called on God, <S%H433><s%> and he answered. <S%H6030><s%> The just, <S%H6662><s%> the blameless <S%H8549><s%> man is a joke. <S%H7814><s%>

In the thought <S%H6248><s%> of him who is at ease <S%H7600><s%> there is contempt <S%H3940><s%> for misfortune. <S%H937><s%> It is ready <S%H3559><s%> for them whose foot <S%H7272><s%> slips. <S%H4571><s%>

The tents <S%H168><s%> of robbers <S%H7703><s%> prosper. <S%H7951><s%> Those who provoke <S%H7264><s%> God <S%H410><s%> are secure, <S%H987><s%> who carry <S%H935><s%> their God <S%H433><s%> in their hands. <S%H3027><s%>
"But <S%H199><s%> ask <S%H7592><s%> the animals, <S%H929><s%> now, <S%H3384><s%> and they shall teach you; <S%H5775><s%> the birds of the sky, <S%H8064><s%> and they shall tell you. <S%H5046><s%>
Or speak <S%H7878><s%> to the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it shall teach <S%H3384><s%> you. <S%H1709><s%> The fish of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall declare to you. <S%H5608><s%>
Who doesn't <S%H3045><s%> know that in all these, <S%H3027><s%> the hand of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has done this, <S%H6213><s%>
in whose hand <S%H3027><s%> is the life <S%H5315><s%> of every living thing, <S%H2416><s%> and the breath <S%H7307><s%> of all mankind? <S%H376><s%>
Doesn't <S%H241><s%> the ear try <S%H974><s%> words, <S%H4405><s%> even as the palate <S%H2441><s%> tastes <S%H2938><s%> its food? <S%H400><s%>
With aged <S%H3453><s%> men is wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> of days <S%H3117><s%> understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
"With God is wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and might. <S%H1369><s%> He has counsel <S%H6098><s%> and understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
Behold, <S%H2040><s%> he breaks down, and it can't <S%H1129><s%> be built again. He imprisons <S%H5462><s%> a man, <S%H376><s%> and there can be no release. <S%H6605><s%>
Behold, <S%H6113><s%> he withholds the waters, <S%H4325><s%> and they dry up. <S%H3001><s%> Again, <S%H7971><s%> he sends them out, and they overturn <S%H2015><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
With him is strength <S%H5797><s%> and wisdom. <S%H8454><s%> The deceived <S%H7683><s%> and the deceiver are his. <S%H7686><s%>
He leads <S%H3212><s%> counselors <S%H3289><s%> away stripped. <S%H7758><s%> He makes judges <S%H8199><s%> fools. <S%H1984><s%>
He loosens <S%H6605><s%> the bond <S%H4148><s%> of kings. <S%H4428><s%> He binds <S%H631><s%> their waist <S%H4975><s%> with a belt. <S%H232><s%>
He leads <S%H3212><s%> priests <S%H3548><s%> away stripped, <S%H7758><s%> and overthrows the mighty. <S%H386><s%>
He removes <S%H5493><s%> the speech <S%H8193><s%> of those who are trusted, <S%H539><s%> and takes away <S%H3947><s%> the understanding <S%H2940><s%> of the elders. <S%H2205><s%>
He pours contempt <S%H937><s%> on princes, <S%H5081><s%> and loosens <S%H7503><s%> the belt <S%H4206><s%> of the strong. <S%H4206><s%>
He uncovers <S%H1540><s%> deep things <S%H6013><s%> out of darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and brings out <S%H3318><s%> to light <S%H216><s%> the shadow of death. <S%H6757><s%>
He increases <S%H7679><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and he destroys <S%H6><s%> them. <S%H7849><s%> He enlarges the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and he leads them captive. <S%H5148><s%>

He takes away <S%H5493><s%> understanding <S%H3820><s%> from the chiefs <S%H7218><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and causes them to wander <S%H8582><s%> in a wilderness <S%H8414><s%> where there is no way. <S%H1870><s%>
They grope <S%H4959><s%> in the dark <S%H2822><s%> without light. <S%H216><s%> He makes them stagger <S%H8582><s%> like a drunken man. <S%H7910><s%>
